title: Watch This Awesome Little Girl Reel in a Huge Fish With Her Barbie Fishing Pole
content:
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 

A little girl named Avery is about to make your day. This champion fisherlady reeled in a 20-inch bass with pure girl power and a Barbie fishing pole apparently made of titanium. Kudos to her awesome dad, who encouraged her to keep trying to reel in the fish by herself, even when she asked for help. Best catch ever.  

Follow Diana on Twitter .  

 From:  The Newsroom
